thread.title: ""Always welcoming""
thread.title_full: ""Always welcoming"" - Review of Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: thirkhatri k
title: ""Always welcoming""
text: This was my second visit to the resort in Kampala and it was the same experience for me which i had in my last visit.Iam really glad for the treatement we received from the hotel.best food in the restaurant, best ambience , once we are here we cant stop ourself to fell in love with this beautiful place.I would like to reccomend this place to the peoole who want to visit uganda in near future.
